story.name: 3c79e934-2f61-4c95-aae0-9468a0c70795
story.title: Germany has no doubt Britain supports statement on Iran's role in Saudi oil field attack
story.summary: USA-IRAN/EUROPE-GERMANY (URGENT):Germany has no doubt Britain supports statement on Iran's role in Saudi oil field attack

xmlText.p: Germany has no doubt Britain supports statement on Iran's role in Saudi oil field attack

BERLIN, Sept 25 (Reuters) - Great Britain still supports a joint statement made with Germany and France on Iran's responsibility in an attack on a Saudi Arabian oil field earlier this month, a spokesman for Berlin's foreign ministry said on Wednesday.
"We have no doubt that Great Britain fully supports the statement", he said. (Reporting by Tassilo Hummel Editing by Riham Alkousaa)
